job_tasks.phrase: Het ondersteunen bij de implementatie van wijzigingsverzoeken
job_tasks.justification: This phrase refers to supporting the implementation of change requests, which is a common task in software development and system integration, ensuring new functionalities or modifications are successfully deployed.

job_tasks.phrase: Het verhelpen van storingen in de omgeving
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes troubleshooting and resolving issues within an environment, which falls under the operational aspects of maintaining systems and infrastructure.

job_tasks.phrase: Het gecontroleerd uitrollen van Linux patches
job_tasks.justification: This task involves the controlled deployment of patches, a core responsibility in system operations and maintenance to ensure security and stability.

job_tasks.phrase: Conform ITIL processen de werkzaamheden uitvoeren
job_tasks.justification: Adhering to ITIL processes is a standard practice in IT operations and service management, focusing on the structured execution of tasks.

job_tasks.phrase: De werkzaamheden worden uitgevoerd op locatie Rotterdam en in sporadische gevallen op andere locaties
job_tasks.justification: This refers to the physical execution of work, which is an operational aspect of managing IT resources and personnel.

job_tasks.phrase: De kandidaat moet bereid zijn om consignatiediensten te draaien
job_tasks.justification: Being willing to perform on-call duties is a direct responsibility within IT operations to ensure continuous service availability.

job_tasks.phrase: de flexibiliteit hebben om (on)gepland werkzaamheden buiten kantoortijden uit te voeren
job_tasks.justification: This describes the need for flexibility in performing work outside regular hours, a common requirement in operational roles to maintain service continuity.

soft_skills.phrase: Naast de kernwaarden van RWS (RADIO = resultaat gedreven, aanspreekbaar, dienstverlenend, integer en ondernemend), vindt het management van IV RWS-Infrastructuur het belangrijk dat er door de medewerkers eigenaarschap wordt getoond en er een natuurlijke neiging is om permanent te verbeteren.
Van de kandidaat wordt verwacht dat hij/zij zich in voorkomende situaties flexibel opstelt.

There are no mentions of AI, ML, or GenAI tasks, technologies, or specializations. Therefore, it does not fit any of the AI/ML-related profiles and is classified as 'Not Relevant'.
